```{r setup}
library(alcyon)
```

```{r}
lineStringMap <- st_read(
  system.file(
    "extdata", "testdata", "barnsbury", "barnsbury_small_axial.mif",
    package = "alcyon"
  ),
  geometry_column = 1L, quiet = TRUE
)
shapeGraph <- sfToAxialShapeGraph(
  lineStringMap,
  keepAttributes = c(1L, 2L)
)
```

```{r}
axMap <- axialShapeGraphToSf(shapeGraph)
plot(axMap$map, max.plot = 64)
```

```{r}
axialResult = axialAnalysis(
  shapeGraph,
  radii = c("n", "3"),
  includeChoice = TRUE,
  includeLocal = TRUE,
  includeIntermediateMetrics = TRUE
)
```

```{r}
axMap <- axialShapeGraphToSf(shapeGraph)
plot(axMap$map[, axialResult$newColumns], max.plot = 64)
```
```{r}
depthResult = depth(
  shapeGraph,
  depthType = Traversal$Topological,
  fromX = 530684,
  fromY = 184100.3)
```

```{r}
axMap <- axialShapeGraphToSf(shapeGraph)
plot(axMap$map[, depthResult$newColumns], max.plot = 64)
```
